KYC OBLIGATIONS

Page

Table of Contents

 

As part of its ongoing CDD obligations, your organisation must continuously monitor all its customers and transactions. The organisation must consider the ML/TF risk it might face, and identify, mitigate and manage the risk.

 

Ongoing due diligence has three main requirements:

 

Click on the terms below for more details

Your organisation's AML/CTF program should include the procedures for ongoing CDD.

The reporting entity must determine when it needs to collect further KYC information or update or verify existing information collected about a customer or beneficial owner of a customer.

Applied in the circumstances specified in the previous page.

A transaction monitoring program identifies suspicious transactions, such as unusual, complex and large transactions with no apparent economic purpose.
